Class ec.e.db.RtDecodingParameters

Class ec.e.db.RtDecodingParameters 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.e.db.RtDecodingParameters
public class RtDecodingParameters
extends Object
RtDecodingParameters tables are used as an argument to RtStandardDecoder() and other Decoder constructors. Whenever that decoder encounters a parameter object in the stream, it will look up the parameter iin the RtDecodingParameters table and if found, will substitute (return) the object in the table as the result of the decode.

Note that you normally want to switch keys/values are around compared to RtEncodingParameters - Your values when encoding become keys when decoding and vice versa.

RtDecodingParameters()
Creates a hashtable-like container for decoding parameters of default size (20).
RtDecodingParameters(int)
Creates a hashtable-like container for encoding parameters of a given size.

elements()
Works just like for Hashtable instances
get(Object)
Works just like for Hashtable instances
isEmpty()
Works just like for Hashtable instances
keys()
Works just like for Hashtable instances
put(Object, Object)
Works just like for Hashtable instances
remove(Object)
Works just like for Hashtable instances
size()
Works just like for Hashtable instances

RtDecodingParameters 
  public RtDecodingParameters()
Creates a hashtable-like container for decoding parameters of default size (20).
RtDecodingParameters 
  public RtDecodingParameters(int size)
Creates a hashtable-like container for encoding parameters of a given size. Use this as a parameters argument to RtStandardDecoder() and other Decoder constructors.
